sentences.en: Old people often subsist on very small incomes.
sentences.cn: 老人往往靠十分微薄的收入艰难度日。

sentences.en: According to the common definition, hunter-gathers are those who subsist by hunting wild animals and gathering wild plants.
sentences.cn: 根据常见定义，捕集者是指那些以捕猎野生动物和采集野生植物为生的人。

sentences.en: She has to get a casual work to subsist.
sentences.cn: 她不得不找一个临时工作维持生活。
